metadata.title: Collaborative Drawing
metadata.category: Building a Drawing App with PencilKit

inlineContent.text: Design the data model for collaborative drawing.

abstract.text: Learn how to integrate PKToolPicker to provide users
with tools like pens, markers, and erasers.
Implement real-time collaborative functionality where
multiple users can draw together.
Learn step-by-step how to build a professional-grade
drawing app using the PencilKit framework.

doc://pencilkit.HIGPencilKit/tutorials/T.title: Building a Drawing App with PencilKit

abstract.text: Learn various methods to save PKDrawing data
to files and restore them.

and the basics of drawing app development.

using PKCanvasView’s Ruler.

the drawing canvas with SwiftUI and UIKit.
